page.title: 09NEWBIGGIN SPORTS CENTRE
page.content: { NEWBIGGIN SPORTS CENTRE}WAS BUILT IN 1973. IT WAS THE FIRST CENTRE TO BE OPENED IN THE AREA AT THE TIME. THE COUNCIL DECIDED THAT THE UNEMPLOYED WOULD HAVE LOTS OF SPARE TIME AND SO {LEISURE}WOULD BECOME AS VALUABLE AS WORK IT WOULD BE NICE IF NEWBIGGIN HAD A SWIMMING POOL.IT WOULD MAKE A DIFFERENES TO NEWBIGGIN BECAUSE MORE MONEY WOULD BE COMEING IN AND PEOPLE WOULD LEARN TO SWIM.MANY PEOPLE TRAVELLED TO NEWBIGGIN BUT WITH THE COST OF TRAVELLING AND OHTER CENTRES BEING BUILT THE NUMBER OF PEOPLE TRAVELLING DROPPED.THERE IS STILL A NUMBER OF PEOPLE TRAVELLING TO NEWBIGGIN FROM LYNEMOUTH AND ELLINGTON BECAUSE THEY HAVE NOT GOT A CENTRE THERE.THE OLD PEOPLE HAVE MEETINGS TWICE A WEEK IN THE FUNCTION HALL AND THE{DISABLED}USE THE SPORTS CENTRE FOR DARTS,POOL,AND BOWLS.
